div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.h1: Somerville ISD Closed the Remainder of the Year with Remote InstructionÂ

div.p: Pre-K Round UP - click link for more information! Monday, May 4th through Friday, May 8th will be registration for Pre-Kindergarten and Kindergarten for the 2020-2021...
Hi! I just wanted to you reach out and express my thanks for your support of SFBV and to give you an update on changes we have made to our programming since we cannot hold...
RFP - Fire Alarm Systems ReplacementFire Alarm Replacement RFP Addendum #1 Proposals Due: 2:00 pm, April 28, 2020 Somerville ISD Administration Building 625 8th...
Congratulations to Senior, Gabby Kovasovic for being selected by KBTX as the classroom champion for April 30th! We are all proud of you and your accomplishments!
Seniors donâ€™t forget about our Zoom meeting at 10am today!!

SISD currently has two hot spots available and would like to place a few more in areas of need. One is at Taters off Park Rd 4, and the other is near the fire department at Birch Creek. We will send passwords to students via gmail or you may call your school or admin for passwords. Contact Principal to request a location for another hot spot.

I would like to thank the Yegua softball team for a shortened, but great first year for me! I truly believe this team had what it took to win district and make a big run in the playoffs! We were already undefeated in district! I hate it has ended this way, but health and safety of our players is bigger than the game. A special thanks to my seniors Gabby and Maddie for being great leaders all year long! You two will definitely be missed! Thanks again for the hard work! Now we need to get refocused for next year!

SISD will be closed for the remainder of the year. We will continue to provide remote instruction and meals through the end of May. We are working on plans for Seniors and we will be in contact with each of you next week. Stay safe, stay healthy, and stay at home.

Somerville Independent School District
625 8th St
Somerville, TX 77879
